hierarchy: Epic (Spec) → Feature (Phase) → User Story (Requirement Key/Functional Group/Priority)
description: Tracking file mapping Azure DevOps work item IDs to repository spec folders. Ready for fresh sync.
grouping_note: The grouping_strategy field records how the agent created each User Story: 'requirement_key' when [US#] markers found in tasks.md, 'functional_group' when tasks grouped by functional area, 'priority_fallback' when only priority-based grouping possible.
